summary: This document is an invoice from FedEx detailing transportation charges for services rendered. It includes information about the account holder, payment due dates, and service details. The invoice reflects a total charge of $33.55, with discounts applied.

persons.name: Lauren Kummer
persons.context: Lauren Kummer is listed as the account holder for the FedEx services detailed in the invoice.

persons.name: Dan Lavendar
persons.context: Dan Lavendar is mentioned as the payer for the FedEx services on the invoice.

events.title: Package Pickup
events.description: A package was picked up by FedEx on this date.

events.title: Package Delivery
events.description: The package was delivered on this date at 08:35.

keyFacts: The invoice is dated November 2, 2001, and details transportation charges from FedEx.
Total charges amount to $33.55 after discounts.
The invoice indicates a pickup date of October 25, 2001, and a delivery date of October 29, 2001.
Dan Lavendar is identified as the payer for the services rendered.
Lauren Kummer is the account holder associated with the FedEx account.
